headline: Agoda's Localization Pays Off: Agoda Report Finds Asia's Most Adaptable Hotels Outperform Peers by 59%
summary: Digital travel platform Agoda released its latest research report, Tailored to Win: Capturing Asia's Tourism Boom, showing that nearly all hotels adopting advanced localization reported improved guest satisfaction and loyalty, with 99% seeing higher satisfaction scores and 91% noting guests are willing to pay more per room. As Asia cements its position as the world's fastest-growing travel engine with over 2 billion middle class consumers alone, the report underscores how localization, tailoring
